Step 1.Planning: Pick up the hand towel from the wicker basket

Step 2.Planning: Take the toilet tissue from the wicker basket

Step 3.Planning: Put the hand towel and toilet tissue on the floor

Step 4.Planning: Remove the deodorant atomizer from the floor

Step 5.Planning: Remove the toothbrush from the toilet

Step 6.Planning: Take the bottle of shampoo from the wicker basket

Step 7.Planning: Put the bottle of shampoo on the floor
